explanation: [0-0] In front of a green background, a woman wearing a pink top and blue pants stands on a green treadmill, smiling and looking to the left. A man in a red and black checkered shirt and jeans stands next to her, smiling and pointing to the left. On the right are two people wearing green tights and green hole shoes, squatting on the ground and helping to fix the treadmill. On the left, a smartphone is mounted on a tripod, recording the woman in pink and the man in jeans. A bit of orange wall can be seen on the left side of the green background. The floor is also covered with a green cloth, and the English caption "Moonwalkers exposed" is displayed above.

[0-2] First, the woman in pink and the man in jeans start walking, then raise their hands, turn their bodies forward, and smile towards the left. The woman in pink points with two fingers, while the two people in green tights on the right give a thumbs-up with their left hands.

[0-2] First, the woman in pink and the man in jeans start walking, then raise their hands, turn their bodies forward, and smile towards the left. The woman in pink points with two fingers, while the two people in green tights on the right give a thumbs-up with their left hands.

[2-10] Then, the woman in pink and the man in jeans turn around to face the right and walk backwards, imitating the moonwalk. They turn their heads and smile at the front. The two people in green tights on the right slowly pull the treadmill away from the right side as the woman in pink and the man in jeans continue to walk backwards.
